job_description:
RINGKASAN TUGAS STAFF MARKETING KOMUNIKASI
Area	Tugas Utama
Branding	Menjaga citra merek, membuat materi corporate
Konten	Copywriting, desain, video, media sosial
Digital Marketing	Sosial media, website, insight digital
Event & Kampanye	Koordinasi event & materi promosi
PR	Media relations, press release, influencer
Riset	Analisis tren & kompetitor
Administrasi	Dokumentasi & laporan
